Class Program

  • java.lang.Object
    • Program

  • public class Program
extends java.lang.Object
    Program to calculate the area and perimeter of Geometric Figures.
    See Also:
    Input, Figure, Triangle, Square, Rectangle, Circle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      View designed to introduce the data of a Circle and displays its results.
